tweet.text: PUBLIC PRESENTATION Dec. 6, 2021 at 10:30am EST At the #HAC meeting, attend "Declassification, Human Rights, and Historical Memory: #FRUS and the U.S. Declassification Project on Argentina" To register for this free online event, please send an email to FortJL@state.gov https://t.co/oN9H6wExyX
